evidence.claim: The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations which implies usage of secure data interchange standards.
They mention interoperability with healthcare standards including HL7 and FHIR for health data exchange.
In-home attendant services require adherence to X12 transaction sets for healthcare billing and claim processing.
Their services suggest integration with EHR systems which often utilize HL7 standards for data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 and HIPAA compliance standards suggesting they engage in healthcare data exchanges.
matched_use_cases: transaction processing with payers and providers
